title: Lesson 83
paragraph: Cascades and normalization help streamline processes. Cooperation, optimism, and proper reflection ensure smooth organizational function.

words.meaning: a series of events or steps happening in order
words.example: The system failure caused a cascade of problems.
The fireworks exploded in the sky.
